BackstoryDef.title: cannibal killer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ended up stranded with [PAWN_possessive] sibling. Left with only one option, they fought them to the death and ate what was left in order to survive, forever giving them a taste for human meat.

BackstoryDef.title: cannibal killer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] faced hardships and near starvation while emerging into young adulthood. During one particularly bad month they turned on their roommate, a small town nobody, and ate them.

BackstoryDef.title: cannibal killer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] always had a curiosity for the taste of flesh. Years of hiding and attempting to conform to society caused [PAWN_pronoun] to snap, killing several of [PAWN_possessive] friends and family and eating them in a big stew.

BackstoryDef.title: cannibal killer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] sees no problem in cannibalism, and spent large portion of their time advocating for the right to eat as [PAWN_pronoun] pleases.
